title: Anxious Rester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Follow a player at night.
- Stay home at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target visits someone who dies, deal an Unstoppable attack to them.
- If you stay home, you will instead attack your visitors.
